title: Assignment and Assumption of PSA Extraction

contract_name.description: The name of the document, e.g., 'Assignment and Assumption of Purchase and Sale Agreement'.

effective_date.description: The date the assignment was executed.

original_agreement_name.description: The name or description of the underlying contract being assigned.

original_agreement_date.description: The date of the underlying contract.

assumption_of_obligations.description: A summary of the clause where the Assignee agrees to assume the Assignor's duties.

consideration.description: Any payment or consideration made for the assignment.
